p: Acute intraperitoneal injections with DOX resulted in significant ( p < 0.001) increases in the AI and CRI values when compared to Groups I and II values ( Table 10). However, with oral pretreatment with 100-400 mg/kg/day of IGESE, there were significant ( p < 0.05, p < 0.001, and p < 0.0001) dose-related decreases in the AI and CRI values with similar effect induced by oral pretreatments with 20 mg/kg/day of Vit. C ( Table 10).
